subject: What's the right direction for our country?
description:
There are lots of surveys that show that most Americans think our country is headed in the wrong direction. But what is the right direction, the one that unites us and motivates us to make that happen?

This is not a survey, it is a deliberation that will help us find our answer.

And this is a new tool for large scale, productive, national discourse that we are developing and hope to get your feedback on.

For other conversations, we will ask again.

subject: What one issue should 'We the People' unite and solve first to move our country in the right direction?
description:
United, we can solve our biggest problems! But to succeed, we need to find a way to agree and focus on one at a time. The one issue that everyone from across the political spectrum would agree has a positive impact. Then we can solve it and move on to the next one.

Take a moment and think about it, but don't over think your answer at this point. You will probably have a new perspective after this. This is just the beginning.

This is not a survey, this is a new kind of tool that is designed to help us discuss our ideas and productively converge on what unites us.

After expressing your views, you will get to see others, and you will get to say why some are more or less important to discuss further. And you will get to see what others say as well. Then after each round we will invite you back to be part of the next one, considering the most unifying ideas from the previous round, until we converge on the conclusions that unite us.

This is a new tool, early in its development and we invite you to provide feedback along the way so we can keep making it better.
